${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:ClearMonocle.NAME: Clear Monocle
${modID}:ClearMonocle.FLAVOR: All the best to see you with.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play 3 #ySkills in a single turn, gain #b

${modID}:CloudyMonocle.NAME: Cloudy Monocle
${modID}:CloudyMonocle.FLAVOR: All the better to see you with.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play 4 #ySkills in a single turn, gain #b

${modID}:ClayBattery.NAME: Clay Battery
${modID}:ClayBattery.FLAVOR: Capable of powering a Game Boy Advanced.

${modID}:DebonairAscott.NAME: Debonair Ascott
${modID}:DebonairAscott.FLAVOR: I got it at Dan Flashes.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b

${modID}:FisheyeMirror.NAME: Fisheye Mirror
${modID}:FisheyeMirror.FLAVOR: My nose isn't really that big... Is it?
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] and shuffle a #yDazed into your draw pile at the start of each turn.

${modID}:SatinCape.NAME: Satin Cape
${modID}:SatinCape.FLAVOR: I knew red was my color.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] whenever you play a power that costs 2 or more.

${modID}:SilverFlute.NAME: Silver Flute
${modID}:SilverFlute.FLAVOR: One of these days you'll learn to play it.

${modID}:SpectralLens.NAME: Spectral Lens
${modID}:SpectralLens.FLAVOR: All the better to haunt you with.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yExhaust a card, draw a card.

${modID}:WoodenDeckBox.NAME: Wooden Deck Box
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you trigger #yCachet, draw a card.
